directions: Combine the shrimp, scallops, cilantro, tomatoes, celery, green onions, lime juice, and serrano peppers in a bowl. Season with salt, white pepper, and black pepper; stir and pour into a glass or plastic container. Cover, and refrigerate 3 hours to overnight. Serve the seafood with the lime juice marinade.
ingredients: 1 pound peeled and deveined medium shrimp (30-40 per pound)
2 small serrano peppers, seeded and minced
title: Skeeter's Ceviche
